name: USEU Arena Early Access
description:
Welcome to the Early Access/Demo version of USEU Arena. 

A virtual reality game initially inspired by games like Geometry Wars and Super Stardust.

The goal in USEU Arena is to survive as many enemies as you can while earning points along the way. Collect extra points to increase your score and score multiplier. Use three different gun types and two beam types to strategically destroy your enemies. There are currently 10 arenas to fight in  (3 modern and 7 retro). Race the clock and destroy objectives in the Genus level. Defend and use the Tesla towers in the Aurum level. Keep moving, keep fighting and make it to the end.

This game will be constantly under development improving existing content and adding new types of shooting gameplay and levels.

Any feedback is welcome on ways that USEU Arena can be improved or any gameplay you feel would be a great addition to the current game.

Please donate or purchase on Itchio here or on the Oculus store to help the development of this game.

Itchio Link
Oculus Store Link

Enjoy!!

The Early Access Demo version contains an Early Access sign in the player's view and highscores are not saved.
